column4: Does anyone know of a lightweight utility with command line options to display simple html pages? preferably something thats included in ubuntu by default
Rabbitbunny/paddy: sorry I was a bit unclear. I want command line options, but I dont want the util to be command line. It needs to display images etc
if you want GUI apps, look at Epiphany or Dillo (I assume you already ruled out Fx)
but I hear links2 can display graphics anyway =/
